short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Manga/Manhua/Manhwa/Webtoons/Comics chapters as PDF/ZIP(images) from many websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✔ new websites will not be add for now.

✔ Work ONLY on Chrome 80/Firefox 86 (or LESS).
✔ how to install Chrome 80/Firefox 86 (check this link)
https://github.com/AllaliAdil/Manga-Downloader-Extension/tree/main/Browsers

✔ you can download chapter as pdf or zip(images)
✔ download buttons are add to chapters in chapter list (view preview images)
✔ if it's stuck, just refresh the page.

✔ SOURCE CODE IS IN GITHUB:
https://github.com/AllaliAdil/Manga-Downloader-Extension/tree/main/src

***************************************************************
✔ supported websites: (find the list on)
https://github.com/AllaliAdil/Manga-Downloader-Extension
